title: Get Fully Verified with GCash Overseas
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

- [GCash Overseas Available Countries and Services](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/28753833785241-GCash-Overseas-Available-Countries-and-Services)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

After creating your account, verify your GCash Overseas account to unlock and start using GCash services.

Follow the steps below to verify your GCash Overseas account:

1\. On your GCash app, input your number and your MPIN

2\. Tap **Get Started** and read through the following reminders

3\. Complete the information needed and tap **Next**

4\. Select a valid Philippine government-issued ID

**![44.png](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/28792629592985)**

5\. Take a picture of the ID and tap **Submit**

6\. Tap **Next** and take a selfie scan

7\. Complete the information needed and tap **Next**

8\. Review your information and tap **Confirm**

9\. Prepare the following documents and select **Upload Documents Now**

![99.png](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/28792661453849)

10\. Attach your supporting documents and tap **Submit**

11\. You will receive an SMS notification about the status of your application.

Learn more about the [countries and list of services available to GCash Overseas users](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/28753833785241).
